code: import React from'react';import{withKnobs,text}from"@storybook/addon-knobs";import Button from'../components/Button.js';import"../components/css/button.css";export default{title:'Button',decorators:[withKnobs]};export var standard=function standard(){return React.createElement(Button,{label:text("Label","Primary Action"),type:"standard"});};export var small=function small(){return React.createElement(Button,{label:text("Label","Primary Action"),type:"sm"});};export var secondary=function secondary(){return React.createElement(Button,{label:text("Label","Secondary Action"),type:"secondary"});};
